title: School Open Status
description: A list of status records for schools, indicating whether a school was open for in-person instruction for all of a week, some of a week, none of the week, or wasn't in sesion.

weeklyInPersonInstruction.title: Weekly in-person instruction status
weeklyInPersonInstruction.description: Whether the school offered in-person instruction for all of the days of the week, none of them, or a hybrid mixture, or the school was not in  session.

reportingPeriodStartDate.title: School reporting period start date
reportingPeriodStartDate.description: The date of the first day of the week for which this school open status record is valid, in ISO8601 format. Only use if this school has a different reporting period than the other schools in the list.
